description: Aspose.Tasks is a class library for working with Microsoft Project files. Using Aspose.Tasks for .NET you can work with MPP, MPT, XML, XLSX, HTML, PDF, XAML and other formats in your applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:

Features

TASKS-33791 TASKS-33779 Implement FF, SF links rendering across vertical pages
TASKS-33786 TASKS-33779 Implement FS, SS links rendering across vertical pages
TASKS-33785 TASKS-33779 Implement links rendering across horizontal pages
TASKS-33782 TASKS-33775 Implement WBS code definition writing to mpp
TASKS-33781 TASKS-33775 Implement WBS code definition writing to xml
TASKS-33778 TASKS-33775 Implement WBS code definition reading from mpp and xml
TASKS-33775 Support WBS code fields reading and writing
 
Enhancements

TASKS-33779 Provide link arrows between tasks across the pages while MPP->PDF conversion

Bug fixes

TASKS-33808 Exception raised while loading the license if culture uses the UmAlQuraCalendar
TASKS-33804 MPP to PDF always renders collapsed sub tasks in expanded form
TASKS-33801 Image added in "i" column
TASKS-33800 Column text color changes from Black to Red
TASKS-33799 Difference in value of "Max Units" Columns
TASKS-33798 Images missing in "i" column
TASKS-33795 %W.Comp values differ while MPP to PDF conversion
TASKS-33794 Text alignment is disturbed in MPP to PDF conversion
TASKS-33790 MPP to PDF: Tasks shown as Overallocated
TASKS-33788 MPP to PDF: UnAssigned Resource Rendered at the top
TASKS-33787 Value Mismatch for Column Max. Units
TASKS-33728 WBS values missing in the output MPP
title: Aspose.Tasks for .NET
